resources.name: Query: Get Account ID of User
Public Remote.it Queries and Mutations
resources.description:
This documents released public APIs for remote.it. If you need additional API support,
, please contact us.

Query: Get All Tags For Own Account

body.text:
{"query":"#List of tags owned by the user or Organization making query
query {
	login {
		tags {
			name
			color
			created
		}
	}
}

# 	List of available colors
# 	{
#     id: 1,
#     name: 'Gray',
#     color: '#797c86',
#   },
#   {
#     id: 2,
#     name: 'Red',
#     color: '#E65B4C',
#   },
#   {
#     id: 3,
#     name: 'Orange',
#     color: '#EF922E',
#   },
#   {
#     id: 4,
#     name: 'Yellow',
#     color: '#F5CC17',
#   },
#   {
#     id: 5,
#     name: 'Lime',
#     color: '#BBD40F',
#   },
#   {

#     name: 'Green',
#     color: '#61C951',
#   },
#   {

#   {

#   },
#   {
#     id: 9,
#     name: 'Blue',
#     color: '#6193FE',
#   },
#   {
#     id: 10,
#     name: 'Violet',
#     color: '#6F54CC',
#   },
#   {
#     id: 11,
#     name: 'Purple',
#     color: '#8F4EBA',
#   },
#   {
#     id: 12,
#     name: 'Berry',
#     color: '#C236AB',
#   },
#   {
#     id: 13,
#     name: 'Pink',
#     color: '#E13F88',
#   }"}

{"query":"#Create a tag with color that can be assigned to devices and custom roles

mutation {
	setTag(tag: { name: "example", color: 2 })
}

# 	List of available colors
# 	{
#     id: 1,
#     name: 'Gray',

resources.name: Mutation: Add Multiple Tags to Devices

body.text:
{"query":"#Proxy connections can be generated to individual services and the unique
#address will be provided in the host and port fields.
#
#hostIP values could contain
#
#0.0.0.0 for fully public connections available to user
#
#255.255.255.255 to allow only the first accessing IP to "Latch" the connection.
#Blocking all others
#
#A unique public IP address to only allow that IP to access the connection

mutation GetConnection($serviceId: String!, $hostIP: String!) {
	connect(serviceId: $serviceId, hostIP: $hostIP) {
		id
		created
		host
		port
		reverseProxy
		timeout
	}
}
","variables":{"serviceId":"80:00:00:12:34:56:78:90","hostIP":"255.255.255.255"},"operationName":"GetConnection"}

{"swagger":"2.0","info":{"title":"Public remote.it API Reference","description":"This documents all released public APIs for remote.it. If you need additional API support,
, please contact us.","termsOfService":"http://remote.it/","contact":{"email":"support@remote.it"},"license":{"name":"Apache 2.0","url":"http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html"},"version":"v27"},"host":"api.remote.it","basePath":"/apv/v27","schemes":["https"],"paths":{"/device/connect/":{"post":{"tags":["Public Connections"],"summary":"Request a proxy connection to a active registered device service","description":"

Make a proxy connection to connectd associated with this 'deviceaddress'. The * 'deviceaddress' needs to be retrieved initially using the /device/list/all API. A valid * login token is required. The connection may take several seconds to complete. The connection * will last for a minimum of 8 hours and remains active unless the logout API is called or * the user signs out of the portal. Connections are not intended to be shared and have an access * restrictions based on 'hostip' address or private subdomain.

","operationId":"createConnection","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"developerkey","in":"header","description":"remot3.it User Developer Key. Get yours from remot3.it portal account settings","required":true,"type":"string"},{"name":"ConnectionRequest","in":"body","description":"Device connection information","required":true,"schema":{"required":["deviceaddress"],"properties":{"deviceaddress":{"description":"device service UID","type":"string"},"devicetype":{"description":"device service encoded device_type value","type":"string"},"hostip":{"description":"IP for access restriction. 0.0.0.0 is unrestricted.","type":"string"},"wait":{"description":"wait for connection to complete ['true' or 'false']","type":"string"},"isolate":{"description":"optional request to override legacy proxy routing. Requires configuration.","type":"string"},"verifyActive":{"description":"optional request to verify device state before connecting ['true' or 'false']","type":"string"},"applicationTag":{"description":"optional value to tag request with the applicationb tag","type":"string"}}}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"successful operation JSON status=true","schema":{"required":["status, connection"],"properties":{"status":{"description":"API status flag ['true' or 'false']","type":"string"},"connection":{"description":"proxy connection URL","type":"string"},"connectionid":{"description":"Connection GUID","type":"string"}}}},"401":{"description":"api key failed validation | json body missing | device failed active verification"},"403":{"description":""},"503":{"description":"Backend Proxy Connection Failure"}}}},"/developer/devices/share/":{"post":{"tags":["Public Developer Device"],"summary":"Change device share with another registered user","description":"

Sharing a device with another remote.it user allows them to access devices in * your account. This API will submit the sharing request * which will be processed by us in the background followed by email notification when complete. * Sharing can take quite sometine depending on the number of devices requested. Sharing should be * initiated by specifiying the device's 'Bulk Service' address. All other services on the device * will shared automatically.

* ","operationId":"shareDevice","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"developerkey","in":"header","description":" User Developer Key. Get yours from remot3.it portal account settings","required":true,"type":"string"},{"name":"ShareInfo","in":"body","description":"Share info for the device","required":true,"schema":{"required":["email, options"],"properties":{"options":{"properties":{"emails":{"description":"comma separated list of account emails","type":"string"},"devices":{"description":"comma separated list of device UIDs","type":"string"},"state":{"description":"On - Add sharing, Off - Remove Sharing","type":"string","enum":"[on, off]"},"scripting":{"description":"true - allow scripting, false - no scripting","type":"boolean","enum":"[true, false]"}}},"queue_name":{"type":"string"}}}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"successful operation JSON status","schema":{"required":["status"],"properties":{"status":{"type":"string","enum":"[true, false]"}}}},"400":{"description":"JSON reason=(post data missing | bad parameters | options is missing in the JSON body)"}}}},"/device/list/:whose":{"get":{"tags":["Public Device"],"summary":"Get list of device services for current user","description":"

Retrieve the list of devices registered to this remote.it account. This call * can take a long time to complete if you have many devices and services. You may wish to * consider local caching of the 'deviceaddress' for use with the /device/connect API endpoint.

* ","operationId":"getDeviceList","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"developerkey","in":"header","description":" User Developer Key. Get yours from remot3.it portal account settings","required":true,"type":"string"},{"name":"whose","in":"query","description":" Flag indicating scope (mine, all)","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"successful operation JSON status=true, list of device services","schema":{"required":["status"],"properties":{"status":{"description":"API status [true, false]","type":"string"},"cached":{"description":"caching state for the returned data [true, false]","type":"string"},"devices":{"type":"array","items":{"properties":{"deviceaddress":{"description":"unique UID for the device service","type":"string"},"ownerusernamne":{"description":"username of the device service owner","type":"string"},"devicetype":{"description":"encoded deviuce type. See connctd documentation","type":"string"},"devicestate":{"description":"current device service state [active, inactive]","type":"string"},"devicelastip":{"description":"public IP address detected by the service","type":"string"},"lastinternalip":{"description":"local IP address detected by the device","type":"string"},"servicetitle":{"description":"common name for the service type","type":"string"},"georegion":{"description":"which of our georegions the device IP was located","type":"string"},"shared":{"description":"[not-shared, shared-to, shared-from]","type":"string"},"lastcontacted":{"description":"datetime when device service last pinged the service","type":"string"},"createdate":{"description":"datetime when the device was originally created","type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}}},"403":{"description":"get device list failed"}}}},"/device/states/:whose":{"get":{"tags":["Public Device"],"summary":"Get list of device service state for current user","description":"

Retrieve the list of device service states registered to this remote.it account. This call * can take a long time to complete if you have many devices and services. You may wish to * consider local caching of the 'deviceaddress' for use with the /device/connect API endpoint.

* ","operationId":"getDeviceStates","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"developerkey","in":"header","description":" User Developer Key. Get yours from remot3.it portal account settings","required":true,"type":"string"},{"name":"whose","in":"query","description":" Flag indicating scope (mine, all)","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"successful operation JSON status=true, list of device services","schema":{"required":["status"],"properties":{"status":{"description":"API status [true, false]","type":"string"},"cached":{"description":"caching state for the returned data [true, false]","type":"string"},"devices":{"type":"array","items":{"properties":{"deviceaddress":{"description":"unique UID for the device service","type":"string"},"devicealias":{"description":"unique name for the device service","type":"string"},"devicestate":{"description":"current device service state [active, inactive]","type":"string"},"servicetitle":{"description":"current device service title [Bulk Service, SSH, etc]","type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}}},"403":{"description":"get device states failed"}}}}},"definitions":{},"responses":{"404":{"description":"JSON reason=(user not available)"}}}
